00039 class File
00040 {
00041         public:
00042                 enum Expression
00043                 {
00044                         PreprocessorExpression, //has to stay before comment expression!
00045                         DocCommentExpression, //This tool
00046                         CommentExpression,
00047                         TypeExpression,
00048                         ConstantExpression,
00049                         ExtendsExpression,

00063                         EndnovjassExpression,

00066                         TextmacroExpression,
00067                         EndtextmacroExpression,
00068                         RuntextmacroExpression, //An instance of the macro
00069                         RequiresExpression,
00070                         NeedsExpression,
00071                         UsesExpression,
00072                         InitializerExpression,
00073                         DefaultsExpression,
00074                         MethodExpression, //Operator is not required because the syntax is "method operator..."
00075                         EndmethodExpression, //Required for function blocks, there can not be custom types
00076                         PrivateExpression,
00077                         PublicExpression,
00078                         StaticExpression,
00079                         DebugExpression,
00080                         KeywordExpression,
00081                         LibraryExpression,
00082                         Library_onceExpression,
00083                         EndlibraryExpression,
00084                         ScopeExpression,
00085                         EndscopeExpression,
00086                         StructExpression,
00087                         EndstructExpression,
00088                         InterfaceExpression,
00089                         EndinterfaceExpression,
00090                         DelegateExpression, //new
00091                         StubExpression, //new
00092                         ArrayExpression, //could not be the first expression in line (Not required in Jass code)
00093                         MaxExpressions
00094                 };
00095 
00096                 enum DocExpression
00097                 {

00099                         ToDo,
00100                         Parameter,
00101                         Return,
00102                         State,

00105                 };
